actions.text: On agreeing to the Murphy (FL) amendment (A019) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A019) offered by Mr. Murphy (FL).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Murphy (FL) amendment (A019) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole

description: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to be used to maintain or improve Department of Defense real property with a zero percent utilization rate according to the Department's real property inventory database, except in the case of maintenance of a historic property as required by the National Historic Preservation Act or maintenance to prevent a negative environmental impact as required by the National Environmental Policy Act of 1969.
purpose: Amendment prohibits use of funds in the bill to maintain or improve Department of Defense real property with a zero percent utilization rate (according to the Department's real property inventory database), except in the case of maintenance of a historic property or maintenance to prevent a negative environmental impact.
